column13: Multilingual<ref name="Multilingual">For example  multilingual isn't supported if char 'Ð™' isn't displayed correctly on movie filename on the client device.</ref>
column15: Subtitles<ref name="Subtitles">For example  subtitles are not supported if they only work with few renderers.</ref>

column4: <ref name="Python">Python or external packages are required.</ref>

column10: <ref name="Coherence-AV">Audio: using gstreamer  Video: work in progress</ref>

column5: <ref name="GeeXboX">GeeXboX is provided as its own Linux distribution</ref>

column8: <ref name="XBMCPictures">This feature is not in the latest stable release of XBMC but is available in the latest nightly releases.</ref>

column4: <ref>Run on MAC OS X using WineBottler</ref>
column15: <ref name="KooRaRoo-Subtitles">Supports streaming external subtitles (SRT  SMI  SUB)  embedded subtitles and burning-in subtitles (including DVD graphical subtitles) on devices that don't support external subtitles.</ref>

column4: <ref name="MediaTomb">Mac support provided by Fink at http://pdb.finkproject.org/pdb/package.php/mediatomb</ref>
<ref name="minidlna Mac OS X">Patches can be found at https://sourceforge.net/projects/minidlna/forums/forum/879956/topic/3412747</ref>
column10: <ref name="minidlna transcode">Patches and discussion at https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=3193201&group_id=243163&atid=1121518  and branched version to handle transcoding at https://bitbucket.org/stativ/readymedia-transcode</ref>
column11: <ref name="minidlna web interface">Web interface supported via a Webmin module  see https://sourceforge.net/projects/minidlnawebmin/</ref>

column15: <ref name="PlayOn-Subtitles">Only on selected renderers  both embedded subtitles and external SRT</ref>

column11: <ref name="PS3 Media Server">A WIP limited web interface for the optional media library exists in the latest betas.</ref>

column1: Rivet<ref name="Rivet">Discontinued paid version as of 21 July 2011 see http://thelittleappfactory.com/rivet/. A free  but unsupported  version is still available.</ref>

column15: <ref name="Serviio-Subtitles">Only on selected renderers  and never for embedded subtitles (external SRT only) http://www.serviio.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=33</ref>

column10: <ref name="TwonkyMedia">Transcoding supported in TMS 5.0 and later on the PC. Must download FFmpeg  VLC or other 3rd-party transcoding engines to use</ref>

column3: <ref name="WMC">Must purchase a Microsoft Windows license to use</ref>
